name: Smit Faldu
summary: AI/ML Engineer with hands-on experience in NLP, LLMs (Gemini, OpenAI, LLaMA), and RAG pipelines using LangChain, LangGraph, FAISS, and Pinecone. Skilled in developing AI automation apps with FastAPI, Flask, and deploying them on GCP. Integrated Google APIs like Gmail and Slides for smart productivity tools. Proficient in building ML/DL models using TensorFlow and leveraging Hugging Face models for real-world use cases. Frontend development experience with React for UI integration.

workExperience.title: AI/ML Intern
responsibilities: Developed AI automation pipelines using Google Gemini, LangChain, LangGraph, and Hugging Face for founder-investor matching and email outreach.
Built FastAPI-based backend services for scalable LLM-powered applications, deployed on GCP.
Integrated Gmail and Google Slides APIs to auto-generate and analyze pitch decks for founders.
Contributed to end-to-end systems for intelligent fundraising tools including pitch deck generation, analytics, and communication workflows.

education.institution: SAL INSTITUTE OF TECH. AND ENG. RESEARCH (GTU)
education.degree: Currently pursuing Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Computer Engineering

projects.title: AI Email Automation
description: Developed an AI-powered email automation platform using FastAPI, Gemini, and LangChain to generate personalized investor outreach emails.
Integrated Google OAuth and Gmail API for secure sending, drafting, and flexible scheduling (specific time or N emails/day).
Implemented reply fetching, batching logic, and user-specific campaign tracking with MongoDB for robust email management.
Deployed the full-stack system on Google Cloud for scalable access, reliability, and real-time performance.

projects.title: Founder–Investor Matching AI System
description: Developed a RAG-based AI platform for matching startup founders with relevant investors using Gemini and Hugging Face models.
Utilized LangChain and FastAPI to build the backend workflow and RESTful interface for processing founder and investor profiles.
Implemented vector embeddings and similarity search using FAISS to generate intelligent, ranked investor matches.
Stored match results in MongoDB and deployed the complete system on Google Cloud Platform for scalability and reliability.

projects.title: Pitch Deck Analyzer
description: Built a FastAPI-based pitch deck analysis tool that accepts PDF input and leverages Gemini to extract key insights from startup presentations.
Designed a LangGraph workflow to generate multi-layered analysis, including overall ratings, problem–solution evaluation, and executive summaries.
Integrated strengths and weaknesses assessment along with improvement suggestions using structured prompting via LangChain.
Stored analysis reports in MongoDB and deployed the full system on Google Cloud for scalable and efficient access.

projects.title: AI-powered Mock Pitch Voice Agent
description: Developed a voice-based AI agent to help founders practice mock pitches with realistic investor-style feedback.
Used Whisper for speech recognition and Gemini + LangGraph to analyze pitch content and delivery.
Generated voice feedback using Google Cloud TTS for an interactive, human-like experience.
Built with FastAPI and stored session data and analysis results in MongoDB, deployed on GCP for scalability.
